amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the implementation of Washington state's revised water quality standard.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 46 printed in House Report 115-830 to limit funding for the implementation of Washington State's revised water quality standard.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McMorris Rodgers amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 185 (Roll no. 348).

action.text: Amendment (A042) offered by Mrs. McMorris Rodgers.
